data.inputs required: Rule#280-Detect when One or more Sophos services are missing or not running.
data.instructions: Description:The rule will detect when one or more sophos services are missing or not running properly

data.inputs required: Incident
Reported Time
Observe the events
data.instructions: Check the device, name of service (missing or not running) , source IP, source name, time

data.inputs required: Check Sophos Console for the user health agent status
data.input details: Triaging Steps performed: Check ip reputation - clean. Check hostname .. ARQ-00374 Check history – for 90 day s/ 30 days.. etc – NA Check signin logs -- NA Escalating (Yes/ No) Yes Closure comments for TP / FP / Benign Positive: TP (As checked All sophos services are not running) INC0095259
data.instructions: Check in the sophos console >> My products >>  Endpoint >> computer (check with a bad status) update the user details if any service is missing.

data.inputs required: Check if the status all the services are running or not
data.input details: Yes, verified all the details no suspicious found. All services are running with the user.
data.instructions:
If all services are running ok, no need to take action. 
If any service is missing raise a ticket or Incident to SSIT Team.

data.inputs required: Make a word document to list the details of user if any of the sophos services missing
data.instructions: Attached the details as an Artificats to next sheet based on the details available in the events, update accordingly in the word document.

data.inputs required: Raise a Incident ticket in SNOW
data.instructions: Steps to create incident (Ref: Incident Screeshot)

rule_metadata.description: Steps to create incident (Ref: Incident Screeshot)

data.inputs required: Upload the same word document (Step no. 6) and also upload the "Sophos perm Fix" video which is shared in the soc group
data.instructions: Attach word document with all the details and upload the video, For video link refer next sheet (Video Link tab)

data.inputs required: Follow up with the IT Team for raising the ticket
data.input details: Not required.Because all services are running.
data.instructions: Regularly Check for the updates from the SSIT team for status of the ticket.
